attributes.action: Invoke article 61 of the magna carta 1215 if the referendum result is ignored
attributes.background: Ignoring the referendum result and having a second referendum is out of the question and pointless as remain shouldn't be an option and treason may's deal is terrible and has rightfully been rejected so we should leave on WTO terms on March 29th

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like to happen by "invoking article 61".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/239998
